Package client.state

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DiscardingState  
    DomesticTradeState
    Representative of the actions the user can take during a domestic trade.
    GameplayState
    This is the generic state.
    InitialState
    This state is the initial state that the game is set to so that no actions can be taken.
    NotMyTurnState  
    PlayingState
    This state is the main state that allows most gameplay actions.
    RobbingState  
    RollingState
    This state allows all of the rolling options.
    SetupState
    This state is used in the first two rounds of the game, where players place roads and cities only.
